notFound.title: SIGNAL NOT FOUND
notFound.subtitle: The frequency you requested does not exist

offline.title: How Offline Mode Works
offline.pwa: This app is a PWA (Progressive Web App) designed for SOTA activators. All files are cached on your device during the first visit, allowing complete offline use in remote locations.
offline.cache: HTML, CSS, JavaScript files are cached by Service Worker on first visit
offline.data: Worldwide SOTA summit database (~6MB) is cached locally for instant offline access with 200,000+ summits
offline.gps: GPS (geolocation) is a hardware feature of your device, so it works without internet connection‚Äîperfect for mountain activation

accuracy.title: Location & SOTA Activation Zone
accuracy.gpsLimits: GPS accuracy typically has an error of 5-10 meters. On summit activation, accuracy may vary:
accuracy.obstacles: GPS signals may be affected by terrain, weather, or tree cover
accuracy.agps: A-GPS (network-assisted) is unavailable offline, which may increase initial GPS lock time
accuracy.estimation: SOTA summits and activation zones are calculated using R*Tree spatial indexing with sub-millisecond query times

data.title: Worldwide Summit Database
data.worldwide: This app provides worldwide SOTA summit coverage across all associations and regions.
data.sota: Uses official SOTA database with {{count}} summits worldwide. Displays nearest 20 summits within 50km radius using R*Tree spatial indexing.
data.summitInfo: Each summit includes: Reference code (e.g., JA/NS-001), Summit name, Coordinates (lat/lon), Altitude (meters), SOTA points (difficulty: 1-10), Association/Region. Summit markers are color-coded by difficulty.
data.databaseSize: This app uses SQLite compiled to WebAssembly (WASM), which enables extremely fast queries directly in your browser without a server. The entire worldwide database (~44 MB) is much smaller than JSON format and includes R*Tree spatial indexing for instant searches. Total storage: ~50 MB cached permanently in your browser.
data.databasePerformance: By using SQLite WASM, the app achieves sub-10ms query times for finding nearby summits from 200,000+ worldwide summits. The compact binary format reduces cache size by 60% compared to JSON, making it perfect for offline PWA use.
data.databaseUpdate: Database created: {{date}}. SOTA summit data is updated periodically from the official SOTA database (sotadata.org.uk). To get the latest data, clear your browser cache and reload the app.
data.elevation: Online: Accurate elevation from GSI API (Japan) or GPS. Offline: GPS elevation or 'Unavailable'.
data.address: Online: Accurate address from OpenStreetMap API. Offline: Shows coordinates and grid locator for radio contact.

troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting
troubleshooting.noLocation: Check your browser and device location settings. On iPhone, check Settings ‚Üí Privacy & Security ‚Üí Location Services ‚Üí Safari.
troubleshooting.slow: You may be in an area with weak GPS signals (indoors, mountain valleys, etc.). Try in an open outdoor area. Offline mode may take longer.
troubleshooting.wrongData: GPS accuracy limits (5-10m error) or you may be near municipal boundaries. Moving a few meters may show correct values.
